name: Bloom (itch) (Satoshi Waku, SrCienpies)
description:
(verb) When a plant or tree blooms, it produces flowers. When a flower blooms, it opens.

Let´s talk about mental health in an easy to play, point and click game where you will experience a blooming journey of self-improvement and change.

"Help dispel misconceptions and social stigma related to openly discussing and
addressing mental health issues"

Game made for the May Day Mental Health Game Jam

Mobile friendly - PC

Disclaimer: This is the first version of the game if you find any bugs let us know. Also, this is not the final version (due to time) so many aesthetic issues will be fixed in further updates.
